newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-BILARDO AGREES TO COACH SEVILLA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BILARDO AGREES TO COACH SEVILLA.

text.p: Boca Juniors coach Carlos Bilardo reached agreement to take over from Jose Antonio Camacho at managerless Sevilla on Tuesday, but has not yet signed a contract with the Spanish club.
The former Argentine national coach trained Sevilla during the 1992-93 season and was instrumental in signing Diego Maradona.
Sevilla, third from bottom of the first division, are currently embroiled in a boardroom struggle.
